development.translate: развитие, разработка, создание, строительство, рост, совершенствование, событие
examples: What are the latest developments?
We will keep you informed of developments.
We were waiting for the next development.
This development played into her hands
the slow development of her skill as a writer
European Development Fund
Development Fund for Africa
Play is very important to a child's development.
children at the same stage of development
Have there been any new developments in the case?
The land was sold for development.
the design and development of new products
How can we improve our chances of career development?
This new development finally decided me!
Creation belongs to eternity and development to time.
The whole area of research is pregnant with possibilities for future development.
Asian Development Bank
demo homes on the new development
How slow is the development of heat.
Development on the project continued apace.
My greatest anxiety was the development of the new software.
the thematic development in the story
The second phase of development overlaps the first.

African Development Bank
African Development Fund
Development Assistance Committee
International Development Agency
Economic Development Administration
a period of sustained economic development
example_translate: Мы будем держать вас в курсе событий.
Это событие сыграло ей на руку.
Игра очень важна для развития ребёнка.
дети на одной и той же стадии развития
Как мы можем улучшить свои шансы на развитие карьеры?
Теперь, когда всё так обернулось, я, наконец, решился!
Творение принадлежит вечности, а развитие — времени.
Вся эта область исследований полна скрытых возможностей для будущего развития.
образцы домов на новом участке застройки
